title: Slow cooker smokey bourbon ribs
ingredients: ['10 pork spare ribs', '180ml bourbon (can also be made with sherry, whiskey or even beer)', '4 tablespoons BBQ sauce', '1 heaped tablespoon runny honey', 'pinch chinese 5 spice', '2 teaspoons smoked paprika', '2 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce', '1 heaped teaspoon chilli powder', '1 clove garlic, crushed', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'good pinch coriander', 'cornflour or arrowroot for thickening', '2 spring onions, finely sliced']
